channel.title: Juan J. Francisco
channel.description: Recent content on Juan J. Francisco

item.title: How to enable [always on] for free app services in Azure?
item.description: How to enable [always on] for free app services in Azure? Do you find usefull the free app services offer by azure? I do. Even thought it’s a very good choice when it comes to test your application also can be a little anoying thanks to the “always on” feature that is only enable for basic or higher app service plan, but don’t worry I found a solution that que help us to accomplish the same behavior and completed free!
